description: Create complete hero section with 3D consciousness orb animation using Three.js. Include bold headline 'SYNAPSE SWARM', subtitle about multi-agent AI system, dual CTA buttons, and real-time stats (7 agents, âˆž conversations, 100% ethical). Reference design style: /home/user/Attachments/6a8a2117-305c-4f62-9a8c-a6cb587ef10d.jpg - use the cyan glowing orb and dark tech aesthetic

Build particle network background with animated particles and connection lines. Particles should appear throughout the page, creating a sense of interconnected agents. Use glassmorphic cards and smooth fade-in animations on scroll with GSAP

Create Features Showcase section with 6 cards: Agent-to-agent Communication, Consensus Mechanisms, Consciousness Monitoring, Ethical Governance, Real-time Sync, Adaptive Learning. Each card should have hover animations and icons. Design should match the futuristic sci-fi aesthetic

Build Agent Showcase section with 7 agent cards, each with unique color, agent personality/role, expertise tags, and PAS score visualization bars. Animate on scroll with staggered fade-ins. Include agent names and brief descriptions

Create interactive Architecture Diagram section with 6 color-coded layers representing system architecture. Layers should slide in on scroll with hover effects. Include labels for each layer explaining the architecture
Add Live Demo section with placeholder for embedded chat interface. Include animated background similar to hero section. Add CTA button to try the demo

Create responsive navigation bar that sticks to top with scroll effect. Include logo/branding, nav links (Features, Agents, Architecture, Demo, Docs), and CTA button. Navigation should adapt for mobile with hamburger menu

Build final CTA section with shine animation effect, compelling headline about getting started with SYNAPSE SWARM, and multiple call-to-action options. Design should match the premium sci-fi aesthetic
Create footer with 4-column layout containing: Product links, Resources, Company info, and Social links. Include copyright and subscription prompt. Responsive on mobile

Implement smooth scroll animations using GSAP and ScrollTrigger for all sections. Add hover effects on cards/buttons, gradient text effects on headings, parallax effects on scroll. Use color scheme: cyan (#00D9FF), pink (#FF6B9D), purple (#9D4EDD), green (#00F5A0)

Optimize for mobile responsiveness with breakpoints at 1024px (tablet), 768px (mobile), and 480px (small mobile). Reduce particle count on mobile, simplify animations, ensure all sections reflow properly. Touch-friendly buttons and readable font sizes

Set up CSS animations for pulse effects on orb, rotating backgrounds, shine animations on CTA section, fade-in-up effects for text. Use CSS variables for colors and fonts (Google Fonts: Inter for body, Space Grotesk for headings). Keep total file size around 60KB
